about_the_game:
Unlock more customization options for Block Heads: Instakill. Featuring new skins, sounds, guns, and kill styles! With a focus on the magical and fantastical of everyday life.

  • 32 NEW Skins, some with multiple variations, including: Elf Assassin, Jester, Wizard, King, Knight, Undead Skeleton.
  • 16 NEW Hats: Without a coxcomb thou art but a m're peasant
  • 1 NEW Outfit: An outfit perfect for tracking across the desert.
  • 4 NEW Guns: 2 outlandish weapons and a staff and wand fit for Merlin himself.
  • 4 NEW Gun Sounds: A perfect complement for this packs armament.
  • 3 NEW Kill Styles: Turn your opponents to ice in more ways than one and off with their heads!
detailed_description:
Unlock more customization options for Block Heads: Instakill. Featuring new skins, sounds, guns, and kill styles! With a focus on the magical and fantastical of everyday life.

  • 32 NEW Skins, some with multiple variations, including: Elf Assassin, Jester, Wizard, King, Knight, Undead Skeleton.
  • 16 NEW Hats: Without a coxcomb thou art but a m're peasant
  • 1 NEW Outfit: An outfit perfect for tracking across the desert.
  • 4 NEW Guns: 2 outlandish weapons and a staff and wand fit for Merlin himself.
  • 4 NEW Gun Sounds: A perfect complement for this packs armament.
  • 3 NEW Kill Styles: Turn your opponents to ice in more ways than one and off with their heads!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q6600 2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
